oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - #157 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two recordings of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), and Jerry Rivers (performer), one listed as show #157 and the other listed as show #158 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Jerry Rivers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks -- Hey Good Lookin' (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- Silver Bells (band instrumental) -- Hank Williams advertises Mother's best and introduces the next tune -- (I'm Gonna) Sing, Sing, Sing (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams introduces the next tune -- Turkey In The Straw (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme -- [break] -- Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Hank Williams talks -- I Can't Help It (If I'm Still In Love With You) (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams talks -- Dance All Night (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- Lonely Tombs (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Rivers, Jerry, 1928-;
